name: logging/disable
description: Disable logging for a persona. Persists to .continuum/logging.json

params.name: persona
params.description: Persona uniqueId to disable logging for (e.g., 'helper', 'codereview')

params.name: category
params.description: Specific category to disable. If not specified, disables all logging for the persona

results.name: enabled
results.description: Whether any logging remains enabled for this persona

results.name: categories
results.description: Categories still enabled (empty if all disabled)

examples.description: Disable all logging for helper persona
examples.expectedResult: { persona: 'helper', enabled: false, categories: [], message: 'Disabled all logging for helper' }
{ persona: 'helper', enabled: true, categories: ['cognition'], message: 'Disabled training logging for helper' }
